moves.name: Avatar State
moves.description: Aang enters the Avatar State, becoming extremely powerful

moves.name: Tornado Whirl
moves.description: Aang spins a dazzling whirlwind at his opponent

moves.name: Dolphin Spray
moves.description: Aang showers his opponent with a strong burst of water

characters.name: Chief Arnook
characters.description: chief of Northern Water Tribe, anti female combative waterbending, father of the moon

moves.name: Grumpy Old Man
moves.description: Chief Arnook shows his dominance as a Grumpy Old Man

moves.name: Patriarchy
moves.description: Chief Arnook shows his manly Waterbending strength that apparently only men can possess

moves.name: Giant Wave
moves.description: Chief Arnook waves his arm and controls a giant wave that washes over his opponent

moves.name: Icy Rain
moves.description: Chief Arnook controls frozen water droplets that fall at a frightening speed above his opponent

new moves.name: Icy Rain
new moves.description: Aang controls frozen water droplets that fall at a frightening speed above his opponent
